unsetunset掌握ChatGPT：学术论文写作的58个全面提示 📚✨（文末有福利 🎁！）unsetunset

ChatGPT的强大功能正在改变我们的学习与写作方式。为了让宝子们更好地利用ChatGPT来提升学术论文写作质量，小编精心整理了这篇实用指南。通过正确的提示词，写作过程可以变得更高效、更专业。

一共8个方向，宝子们可以保存后，慢慢消化哦。

1. 确定研究方向

  1. 我如何组织关于[你的研究主题]的论文呢？你能否为我提供一个大纲，或者建议一些可能的章节标题？

When structuring a paper on [your specific topic], what would be an effective approach? Could you offer an outline or suggest potential section headings?

  1. 我在撰写一篇关于[你的研究主题]的论文。你能指导我如何构建这篇论文吗？特别是，在[你选择的部分，比如“文献综述”]中，哪些子主题是我需要重点涵盖的？

I’m working on a paper about [your specific topic]. Could you help me outline its structure and recommend which subtopics to emphasize in the [selected section, e.g., "Literature Review"]?

  1. 对于讨论[具体主题，例如“气候变化”]的论文，在构建[你选择的部分，比如“文献综述”]时，我该如何有效地整合来自[特定时期，例如“2010年代”]的研究呢？

For a paper addressing [specific topic, e.g., "climate change"], what’s the best way to structure the [selected section, e.g., “Literature Review”] while integrating research from [specific decade or period, e.g., "the 2010s"]?

  1. 我正在编写一篇关于[具体主题，例如“生物多样性减少”]的论文。你能建议我如何安排[你选择的部分，例如“讨论”]，以便融入来自[特定学科，例如“社会经济学”]的观点和[特定区域或生态系统，例如“热带雨林”]的相关研究吗？

I’m drafting a paper on [specific topic, e.g., “biodiversity loss”]. How should I organize the [selected section, e.g., “Discussion”] to include perspectives from [specific discipline, e.g., “socio-economics”] and findings related to [specific region or ecosystem, e.g., "tropical rainforests"]?

  1. 假设你是编辑，针对一篇关于[你的研究主题]的论文，你会建议我如何构建整篇论文？有没有一些关键部分或元素是我需要特别注意的？

Imagine you’re an editor for a moment. How would you recommend structuring a paper on [your specific topic]? Are there key sections or elements I should pay special attention to?

  1. 作为论文结构顾问，如果我计划在[主题，例如“量子物理”]的论文中涵盖像[具体内容，例如“量子纠缠和传输”]这样的方面，你能否建议一个逻辑的写作流程和潜在的章节标题？

As a structural consultant for my paper on [topic, e.g., "quantum physics"], could you suggest a logical flow and potential chapter titles, especially when I intend to cover aspects such as [specific elements, e.g., "quantum entanglement and teleportation"]?

  1. 作为我的编辑指南，针对一篇讨论[具体主题，例如“量子计算”]的论文，你会如何建议我构建[选择的部分，例如“研究发现”]？尤其是在整合[特定学科，例如“软件工程”]的观点和来自[特定地区，例如“东亚”]的案例研究时，我该如何着手？

As my editorial guide, how would you recommend structuring the [selected section, e.g., "Findings"] of a paper focused on [specific topic, e.g., "quantum computing"]? Especially when incorporating perspectives from [specific discipline, e.g., "software engineering"] and case studies from [specified region, e.g., "East Asia"]?

2. 论文校对

  1. 请帮我检查这段文字，看看是否存在语法错误或风格不当之处：[在此处粘贴您的文本]。

Could you review this passage for any grammatical issues or stylistic improvements: [paste your text here]?

  1. 我正在撰写一篇[文件类型，例如“论文”]，请您审阅这一段落，看是否有语法或风格上的问题：[在此处粘贴您的文本]。

I’m drafting a [type of document, e.g., “thesis”]. Could you check this paragraph for potential grammatical or stylistic errors: [paste your text here]?

  1. 请帮我检查我关于[具体主题，例如“可再生能源”]的[文件类型，例如“论文”]中的这段文字，看看是否有语法或风格上的问题：[在此处粘贴您的文本]。

Could you review this passage from my [type of document, e.g., “dissertation”] on [specific topic, e.g., “renewable energy”] to check for any grammatical or stylistic errors: [paste your text here]?

  1. 请仔细审查我撰写的[文件类型，例如“期刊文章”]中关于[具体主题，例如“深海探索”]的这一段落，标出任何语言或结构上的问题，并给出符合[目标出版物或受众，例如“自然杂志”]风格的改进建议：[在此处粘贴您的文本]。

Could you carefully review this section from my [type of document, e.g., “journal article”] on [specific topic, e.g., “deep-sea exploration”] and point out any linguistic or structural issues? Also, suggest how it could better align with the style of [target publication or audience, e.g., “Nature Journal”]: [paste your text here].

  1. 作为我的校对者，请帮助我检查这一段文字：[在此处粘贴您的文本]，是否存在语法或风格上的错误？

As my proofreader, could you review this passage: [paste your text here] and let me know if there are any grammatical or stylistic mistakes?

  1. 作为初步校对者，我撰写了一部分关于[具体主题，例如“纳米技术”]的[文件类型，例如“研究提案”]。请对语法、连贯性以及是否符合[目标出版物或风格，例如“IEEE标准”]的要求提出意见：[在此处粘贴您的文本]。

As my preliminary proofreader, I’ve drafted a section of my [type of document, e.g., “research proposal”] on [specific topic, e.g., “nanotechnology”]. I would appreciate feedback on grammar, coherence, and whether it aligns with [target publication or style, e.g., “IEEE standards”]: [paste your text here].

3. 引用格式

  1. 我需要按照[所需风格，例如，APA、MLA]格式编排这个引用，您能帮助我吗？这是来源信息：[在此处粘贴来源详情]。

I need to format this citation in [desired style, e.g., APA, MLA]. Could you help? Here’s the source: [paste source details here].

  1. 在我的文档中，我引用了一篇由[作者姓名]撰写的[来源类型，例如“会议论文”]。我应该如何按照[所需风格，例如“芝加哥”]格式化这一引用？

I’m citing a [type of source, e.g., “conference paper”] written by [author’s name] in my document. How should I format this in [desired style, e.g., “Chicago”]?

  1. 作为引用指南，您能帮助我按照[引用风格，例如“APA”]格式化一篇[来源类型，例如“期刊文章”]的引用吗？

As a citation guide, could you assist me in formatting a citation for a [source type, e.g., “journal article”] in [citation style, e.g., “APA”]?

  1. 我引用了一篇由[作者姓名]在[年份]发布的[来源类型，例如“网络文章”]。请问，我应该如何以[所需风格，例如“MLA”]格式编排这一引用？

I’ve cited a [type of source, e.g., “web article”] authored by [author’s name] in [year]. How should I format this in [desired style, e.g., “MLA”]?

4. 内容改写

  1. 你能帮我改写这段话，使其更加简洁吗？[在此处粘贴您的原始声明]。

Can you help me rephrase this statement to make it more concise? [paste your original statement here].

  1. 我想用自己的语言表达[来源作者姓名]的这个观点：[在此处粘贴原始声明]。你能帮我调整一下吗？

I’d like to express this idea from [source author’s name] in my own words: [paste the original statement here]. Could you assist?

  1. 我想引用[来源作者姓名]关于[具体主题]的工作中的一个想法。你能帮我改写这一观点，同时保持原意吗？[在此处粘贴原始声明]。

I’m referencing an idea from [source author’s name] on [specific topic]. Can you help me rephrase this while preserving the original meaning? [paste the original statement here].

  1. 扮演一个语言匠人，帮我改写这句话，使其更自然，但不要失去本质：[在此处粘贴您的原始声明]。

As a wordsmith, could you rephrase this sentence to make it more natural without losing its essence: [paste your original statement here]?

  1. 作为我的改写助手，我想引用[作者姓名]关于[主题]的声明：[在此处粘贴原始声明]。我应该如何避免抄袭地表达这一点？

As my rephraser, I’d like to reference this statement from [author’s name] about [topic]: [paste original statement here]. How can I express this without plagiarizing?

  1. 作为我的防剽窃帮手，我想在[类型的工作]中使用[来源作者姓名]关于[具体主题]的见解。请帮我用我自己的话表达，并保持符合我的写作风格：[在此处粘贴原始声明]。

As my plagiarism prevention aid, I’d like to incorporate insights from [source author’s name] on [specific topic] into my [type of work]. Can you help me rephrase this in my own tone? [paste the original statement here].

5. 初稿检查

  1. 请对我的草稿中的这一段摘要提供一些反馈：[在此处粘贴摘要]。

Could you provide feedback on this excerpt from my draft: [paste excerpt here]?

  1. 你能帮我审阅[文档类型，例如“研究提案”]中的这段摘要，并对[特定方面，例如“清晰度和连贯性”]提出反馈吗？[在此处粘贴摘要]。

Could you review this excerpt from my [type of document, e.g., “research proposal”] and offer feedback on [specific aspect, e.g., “clarity and coherence”]: [paste excerpt here]?

  1. 我希望得到关于我[文档类型，例如“政策分析”]中的这一部分的反馈，内容主要讨论[特定主题，例如“可再生能源的采用”]。我特别希望获得关于其[特定方面，例如“论证流程”]的建议，并了解它是否能够满足[目标受众，例如“东南亚的政策制定者”]的需求：[在此处粘贴摘要]。

I’d appreciate your feedback on this section of my [type of document, e.g., “policy analysis”] that focuses on [specific topic, e.g., “renewable energy adoption”]. I’m specifically looking for guidance on [specific aspect, e.g., “argumentative flow”] and whether it meets the needs of [intended audience, e.g., “policy-makers in Southeast Asia”]: [paste excerpt here].

  1. 请作为我的期刊投稿的审稿人，批判性地评价草稿中的这一部分：[在此处粘贴摘要]。

As a reviewer for my journal submission, could you critique this part of my draft: [paste excerpt here]?

  1. 作为我的批评伙伴，我为[文档类型，例如“文献综述”]撰写了关于[特定主题，例如“认知偏见”]的一段。你能评估这一部分的[特定品质，例如“客观性”]，特别是考虑到它对[目标受众，例如“临床心理学家”]的重要性吗？[在此处粘贴摘要]。

Acting as my critique partner, I’ve drafted a segment for my [type of document, e.g., “literature review”] on [specific topic, e.g., “cognitive biases”]. Could you assess its [specific quality, e.g., “objectivity”], especially in relation to its relevance for [target audience, e.g., “clinical psychologists”]: [paste excerpt here]?

6. 文献推荐

  1. 你能推荐与[你的主题或研究问题]相关的关键文献或研究吗？

Could you recommend key papers or studies related to [your topic or research question]?

  1. 我正在寻找与[特定主题]相关的参考文献，这个主题属于[你的学科领域]的更广泛范围。你能建议一些重要的论文或作者吗？

I’m looking for references related to [specific topic] within the broader scope of [your subject area]. Can you suggest some key papers or authors?

  1. 我正在研究[特定主题，例如，“医疗保健中的机器学习”]。你能推荐[特定十年，例如，“2000年代”]在[你的一般领域，例如，“计算机科学”]中的开创性作品吗？

I’m researching [specific topic, e.g., “machine learning in healthcare”]. Could you recommend seminal works from the [specific decade, e.g., “2000s”] within the broader field of [your general field, e.g., “computer science”]?

  1. 我的研究聚焦于[特定主题，例如，“教育中的增强现实”]，特别关注其在[特定时间框架，例如，“2010年代后期”]的演变。你能指引我找到在[你的领域，例如，“教育技术”]中具有影响力的文献或专家吗？

My research focuses on [specific topic, e.g., “augmented reality in education”], particularly its evolution during the [specific time frame, e.g., “late 2010s”]. Can you direct me to foundational papers or key figures within [your field, e.g., “educational technology”]?

  1. 作为文献指南，我正在深入研究[你的主题或研究问题]。你能推荐一些开创性的论文或必读研究吗？

Acting as a literature guide, I’m delving into [your topic or research question]. Could you recommend seminal papers or must-read studies?

  1. 扮演我的文献向导。我正在研究[特定主题，例如，“教学中的虚拟现实”]，希望找到与[特定时代，例如，“2000年代初”]相关的关键文本或专家，特别是那些在[特定环境，例如，“高等教育机构”]中的应用。

Acting as my literary guide, I’m focusing on [specific topic, e.g., “virtual reality in pedagogy”] and looking for key texts or experts from the [specific era, e.g., “early 2000s”], especially those highlighting applications in [specific setting, e.g., “higher education institutions”].

7. 写作提升

  1. 我在写作关于[你的主题]时遇到了一些障碍。你能给我一些提示或问题来激发我的思路吗？

I’m experiencing writer’s block on [your topic]. Could you suggest some prompts or questions to help spark my thinking?

  1. 我正在撰写关于[特定主题]，并将其置于[更广泛的主题或问题]的背景下。你能提供一些问题来深化我的讨论吗？

I’m writing about [specific topic] within the context of [broader theme or issue]. Could you provide some questions that might enhance my discussion?

  1. 我正在探讨[特定主题，例如“城市规划”]与[另一个主题，例如“可持续发展”]之间的关系，特别是在[特定地区或国家，例如“拉丁美洲”]。你能提出一些引发深思的写作提示吗？

I’m exploring the relationship between [specific topic, e.g., “urban planning”] and [another topic, e.g., “sustainable development”], particularly in [specific region or country, e.g., “Latin America”]. Could you offer some thought-provoking writing prompts?

  1. 扮演我的灵感之源，我在[你的主题]上有些卡壳。能否生成一些引导性问题或提示来帮助我继续写作？

Be my muse. I’m stuck on [your topic]. Could you generate some guiding questions or prompts to help me move forward with my writing?

  1. 作为我的写作灵感来源，考虑到[主题A，例如“气候变化”]及其对[主题B，例如“海洋生态系统”]的影响，能否为我生成一些发人深思的问题或写作提示？

As a source of inspiration for my writing, considering the themes of [topic A, e.g., “climate change”] and its impact on [topic B, e.g., “marine ecosystems”], could you create some thought-provoking prompts or questions?

  1. 摘要和总结

  2. 你能根据以下内容帮我起草或总结一个摘要吗？[在此处粘贴主要观点或简要内容]。

Could you help me draft or summarize an abstract based on the following content: [paste main points or brief content here]?

  1. 我正在向[特定会议或期刊]提交一篇论文。你能帮我将[粘贴主要内容或观点]总结成一个简明的摘要吗？

I’m submitting a paper to [specific conference or journal]. Could you help me summarize my findings from [paste main content or points] into a concise abstract?

  1. 我想将关于[特定主题，例如“基因治疗”]的研究结果，从[来源或数据集，例如“最近的临床试验”]中提炼出来，形成一个适合[特定事件，例如“生物技术会议”]的摘要。你能协助吗？

I’m aiming to condense my findings on [specific topic, e.g., “gene therapy”] from [source or dataset, e.g., “recent clinical trials”] into an abstract for [specific event, e.g., “a biotech conference”]. Could you assist?

  1. 扮演摘要服务。根据以下内容：[在此处粘贴主要观点或简要内容]，你会如何起草或总结一个摘要？

Act as an abstracting service. Based on the following content: [paste main points or brief content here], how would you draft or summarize an abstract?

  1. 扮演我的编辑助理。我已整理了关于[主题，例如“遗传改良”]的研究发现。你能帮我制作或优化一个适合[事件或出版物，例如“国际生物学会议”]的简洁摘要吗？

Act as my editorial assistant. I’ve compiled findings on [topic, e.g., “genetic modifications”] from my research. Could you help me craft or refine a concise abstract suitable for [event or publication, e.g., “an international biology conference”]?
